title: Exchange of Messages With Prime Minister Laval on His Departure From the United States.
text: ON BEHALF of the American people I bid you bon voyage on your return to France from this memorable visit to the United States. It has afforded me much pleasure to welcome you among us and I personally appreciate the cordial contacts resulting from our conversations. `HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Pierre Laval, President of the Council of Ministers of France, Waldorf Astoria Hotel, New York City]
